postDescription: Crush the meat so that it is finite and we put it on a griddle to brown. Put the eggs, bacon and ham to fry. Cut the bread in half, put the beef brisket, the fried eggs, the bacon, the ham, the mozzarella, the tomato and the lettuce.Cover with the other half of the bread and serve.

Wash the fish under the cold tap.Roll in the flour and deep fry in oil until crispy.Cut the bread in half . Lay on kitchen towel to get rid of the excess oil and serve hot or cold with a slice of lemon bacon and ham to fry. Crush the meat so that it become soggy
